summary: "Gulliver's Travels" is a famous book written by Jonathan Swift in 1726. It's a funny story that makes fun of people's behavior and popular travel stories. The book is split into four parts, each telling of Lemuel Gulliver's adventures in different strange lands. It was a big hit when it came out and is now considered a classic in English literature. Swift said he wrote it to make people think, not just entertain them.
title: Gulliver's Travels
